casebody.data:
LIBERTARIAN PARTY, et al.
v.
STATE, et al. No. 479A09-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 12, 2011. Kenneth A. Soo, Raleigh, for Libertarian Party of NC. Robert M. Elliot, Winston-Salem, for American Civil Liberties. Katherine Lewis Parker, Raleigh, for NC Green Party. Alexander McC. Peters, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State Board of Elections. Adam S. Mitchell, Raleigh. Karen E. Long, Special Deputy Attorney Geneal, for State Board of Elections. Jason B. Kay. Allison J. Riggs, for Southern Coalition for Social Justice, et al. Christoper Brooks. Irving Joyner, Durham, for Southern Coalition for Social Justice, et al. Damon Circosta, for Southern Coalition for Social Justice, et al. Robert Orr, Asheville.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of January 2011 by Amicus (N.C. Institute for Constitutional Law) for Leave to Withdraw as Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 12th of January 2011."
